name: Run Hobo Run
description:
An infinite runner style HAchubby fanmade game about a hobo running through Chubbyland. Try to get on top of the leaderboards!

Playable on PC and mobile.

There are hints on how to unlock costumes when you mouse over the costume in the costume selection panel. Feel free to help your community members out when you figure out how to unlock one! But try not to spoil the exact unlock requirements!

There is also an Easter♂ egg to discover.

Unfortunately, in the mobile version you are currently not able to change your name.

Go check out https://twitch.tv/HAchubby !

Created by 
Chezuss (Programming, Design, UI)
Melody (Art)
keylimepie (Music and SFX)
